    Helper class to get statistics for ANALYZE.

    • Method Detail

      • getSampleFragments

        public static java.util.List<Fragment> getSampleFragments(java.util.List<Fragment> fragments,
                                                          ProtocolData protData)
        In case pxf_max_fragments parameter is declared, make sure not to get over the limit. The returned fragments are evenly distributed, in order to achieve good sampling.
        Parameters:
        fragments - fragments list
        protData - container for parameters, including sampling data.
        Returns:
        a list of fragments no bigger than pxf_max_fragments parameter.

      • generateSamplingBitSet

        public static java.util.BitSet generateSamplingBitSet(int poolSize,
                                                      int sampleSize)
        Marks sampleSize bits out of the poolSize, in a uniform way.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - pool size
        sampleSize - sample size
        Returns:
        bit set with sampleSize bits set out of poolSize.
